website_summaries.verdict: The best budget option for a vegan friendly protein powder that offers good nutritional value.
pros: Each scoop contains more than 4,400 mg of acids
Comes as an unflavored mixture to include into a wide variety of dishes and beverages
Fine, granular mixture is easy to dissolve with just a single teaspoon in most beverages
cons: Some find the gritty texture and taste undesirable

customer_reviews.title: Different...good different
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every protein under the sun and thought that I might branch out and try Pea Protein. Granted, I was nervous at first and although, through my healthy diet, I could probably find some flavor in cardboard, this protein was a pleasant surprise. This is thicker than proteins like whey, but I liked the taste. I was worried that I would be eating the equivalent of a bowl of peas splashed with vanilla flavor. Not so, this was pretty good. I actually bought the chocolate flavor recently as well. Certainly worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Jerimy

customer_reviews.title: One of the BEST plant based protein out, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great tase if you like vanilla 👍🏾. Great for building and feeding your muscle a natural plant bases protein without pieces of animal in it. I see a huge difference in my petite frame. My muscle are now more defined and have increased in size which is exactly what this is for. Gives me energy and keeps me feeling satisfied. It’s grway over all for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shanietria Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great, GI-gentle protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this protein powder for 5+ years now and it continues to be great. It's gentle on the sensitive GI tract (compared to the inflammatory nature of Whey or Soy) and it tastes great. It blends pretty well in a shaker bottle or blender etc., although if you try to mix with a fork or something there are some clumps left. But overall this is a really good quality, good tasting, GI-friendly protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A Coogle

customer_reviews.title: Does not mix
customer_reviews.text: The flavor (vanilla toffee) was very light and tolerable. The thing I cannot stand is that is does not mix well with water. It creates a weird foam layer on-top of the drink that is all powdery and thick. It also clumps at the bottom of my blender bottle. 10/10 would not buy again. Trying Costco's pea protein next and hopefully it's better!
customer_reviews.author: dana duffy

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Does it taste great? Not at all. Does it blend well? Hell no. But its a great source of protein, and I love that the amino acid profile is listed on the bottle. Come on people, we're not supplementing protein powder for the fun of it! It's not supposed to taste awesome. This is a no nonsense protein supplement that does what its intended, and for that -- I give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Zoey M

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to swallow....
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this protein since it's soy free, lactose free, and gluten free, but unfortunately, it tastes so bad that it makes me gag. I've tried it with milk and almond milk, and I just can't. The texture is thick, but it's the taste that gets me. I don't even know how to describe it without using the word "dirt"... I've used it three times, and I can't anymore. The taste is too bad...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Yum Yum!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Add a scoop of powder, a banana, a cup of water or almond milk, and some ice blend in blender until smooth and it taste like banana pudding. But, then again I'm a health nut and eat extremely healthy. I am accustomed to 'health food', remember this is a protein powder made from a plant base, and for those who are not accustomed to this, they may not care for it. But for me, it's a great addition to my diet. Love that it does not contain soy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Taste was ok
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Taste was ok, usually had to mix it into other smoothies because it's not super sweet on it's own. That is usually what I do anyway so that is not a problem for me. If you prefer something with a more neutral taste over some of the sickly sweet products on the market I would go with this or Naked Protein. And for the price, it's hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable value, but misses the mark on texture and taste
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product to see if I was tolerant of the Pea protein powder by itself. I seem to be disgusting it well, with little issue. However, the powder doesn't seem to mix easily. It tends to lump up and remain gritty, no matter what medium I choose to mix it with, though HOt liquid will help. The taste is not bad, but does have a slight aftertaste, similar to a fake sweetener. It is okay by itself, but not so much with other things. I have not tried it with any fruit, thickener, or dairy product, only nut and oats milks. It could be very, if it was.
customer_reviews.author: HalFlew

customer_reviews.title: Too chalky
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this protein powder. It's very hard to taste the vanilla toffee flavor because no matter what I blend it with (frozen fruit, almond milk, peanut butter) or what juices I cut it with (apple, orange, pineapple), the chalky texture still prevails. I'm "gutting through" this protein powder because I don't like to waste things, but I will not be purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn Littles

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and value!
customer_reviews.text: Has a good flavor and mixes well with my unsweetened vanilla almond milk. Only complaint is the scoop! It’s too big for the container. Please replace with a regular scoop🙏🏾 It’s a pain to scoop out the protein.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Pastran Jr

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Tastes delicious. Smooth texture in my smoothie recipe. My only problem with this product is I can't seem to keep enough of it in my kitchen to keep up with family demand. The vanilla toffee flavor masks some of the less yummy ingredients I blend in (spirulina for example.)
customer_reviews.author: Itinerant T

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but chalky :-/
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is ok, not nasty but not amazing. What I really can’t get past is how chalky it is! Literally, i tried putting half a scoop and I still have a hard time consuming it. I appreciate that it’s vegan but my quest to find a plant based protein powder that doesn’t taste chalky continues.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Taste great but pea protein always has a bit of chalky texture. Also, it tends to settle quickly when mixed with a drink so make sure to stir before each sip.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, great bioavailibilty, and good price. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.text: For those who are vegan or just trying to cut back on the consumption of meats, this is a great alternative. Its high bioavailability, ratios of branched chain amino acids and flavor are great. (This review is for the vanilla toffee) Its comparable in price to whey protein powders and easier on my stomach. I have the plain unflavored version but the vanilla toffee's taste is fantastic. The only con is that Now Nutrition doesn't offer this in the 7 pound version like the unflavored.
customer_reviews.author: Geezer Strongman

customer_reviews.title: I honestly don't find it much worse tasting. I mix it with as others have ...
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of complaints about the taste of this protein powder, while it may be "earthier" than the Whey protein powders I've had, I honestly don't find it much worse tasting. I mix it withas others have suggested to form a complete protein profile.
customer_reviews.author: Woff Den

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This protein powder does not taste good.
customer_reviews.author: dionne

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good and healthy protein but bad taste and texture
customer_reviews.text: Probably a good quality and healthy form of protein but this stuff tasted terrible and was very thick and chalky. I’ll keep searching for a better one
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how good the flavor is. I mix it with almond milk and banana can.
customer_reviews.author: eva vincent

customer_reviews.title: Ummm
customer_reviews.text: This stuff ... the taste... honestly pretty bad. I have to dump several packets of Truvia in it to make it palatable. What I LOVE about this protein is that it makes me feel great when I drink it. I have problems at times with soy and whey, but this? Me and Pea Protein are very compatible because it gives me the energy and mood boost that I need. I'll probably buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sugartown

customer_reviews.title: Swallowing sand
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, this stuff is supper gross. It take like you are swallowing sand. Despite all the great reviews, I took a chance and a chance I will never take again. Yuck. 🤢
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Bitcher

customer_reviews.title: The Vanilla is DISGUSTING
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of trying the vanilla toffee. I did it twice and I had to switch to a new brand. The protein is high and does the job, but god this tasted awful. I tried to use water, cold water, almond milk, vanilla almond milk, but everything tasted disgusting. I'd rather be sore after a workout then taste this. The other flavors might be great, but do not get the vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Howdy, Thanks for reading this review because this vanilla toffee flavor taste like bland oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - Tastes Great, Mixes Smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a good protein supplement and stumbled upon Pea Protein. Its delish - don't even taste anything other than toffee and vanilla - first try of a flavored protein powder. If you're thinking that it'd taste of peas, I don't notice it, but then again, I love peas too. Mixes easily - no grit or chalky taste. Really love it and will be my staple from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Rising

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say it tastes delicious, but it's pleasant enough by itself and I imagine it would be great combined with fruit etc. It doesn't taste like pea at all. Considering the price and the fact that, unlike some other kinds, it doesn't give me any digestive issues, it will become my main protein from now on.
customer_reviews.author: DoraDee

customer_reviews.title: Taste was not so good and too grainy
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product. The flavor was very bland. The thing that I couldn't get pass was how grainy it was. I'm used to the pea protein from another brand. I tried this Now product because it was a lot less than what I had been using. I returned the item and the company was great about refunding my money. I switched back to my previous brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Sky

customer_reviews.title: Powder is awesome in my coffee shake
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my morning coffee shake. Tastes great
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Hard To Like
customer_reviews.text: While I'm not a finicky eater, as others have noted pea protein is hard to take. I added it in my pancakes for some extra protein and to tone down the flavor some. I'm not a vegan or have any other problems with whey protein so I'll stick with that.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Good pea protein
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasant taste not grany smooth texture no like other product like that I tasted but now hasit right this time very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Mr Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Has a bitter/pea-ish flavor
customer_reviews.text: I expected this product to taste like all the other vegan proteins I've had that are sweet and don't taste like the vegetables they're made with. I know taste is subjective but other people in my family can attest to this odd flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Lemmon

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Blend
customer_reviews.text: Flavor was difficult to blend in with different smoothies. The toffee flavor is very strong, and personally wasn't a fan of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but terrible scoop
customer_reviews.text: Flavor's not bad. Better with milk or coffee Grainy but not at all a deal breaker. Does not cause crazy stomach bloatedness like whey protein. The thing is, the scoop is this horrendous rhombus shape. Not a simple round tub-style scoop. It spills everywhere! GET A NORMAL SCOOP PLZ
customer_reviews.author: Just some dude

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Competitive price for good tasting product. Read several clients on strong taste. I thought taste was excellent and not exceptionally strong.
customer_reviews.author: MoJo3

customer_reviews.title: Toffee Vanilla flavoring comes from Stevia and is not sugar
customer_reviews.text: Yummy. I have to juice fast with using only vegetables for my recovery. This put pea protein in Toffee Vanilla tastes very very good!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: I decided to try this vanilla toffee and it is amazing. It tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I used the non-flavor pea protein and it just wasn't doing it for me. I decided to try this vanilla toffee and it is amazing. It tastes great. I make a shake with water, strawberries, super seed, a green formula and this. This and the strawberries overrides the funky taste of the green formula I use. No more nasty shakes for me!
customer_reviews.author: bcgooding

customer_reviews.title: Stomach Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Great, especially if you have sensitivity to ingredients in other protein products!
customer_reviews.author: Z-Money

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is difficult to mask, but I love the ingredients and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah529

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fully dissolve, not a good flavor. Aftertaste comparable to corn meal. I’ve tried many products, and there are many that are better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!!
customer_reviews.text: The moment I tríed this I wanted to cry! I wanted to return it right a way! I was uses trying Whey. Not really for pea. The taste was just not pleasant! But i read the instrucciones and tríed it With more water and realize it was. I definitely will try more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: purplerose

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, this the third flavor that I have bought from this company , trying to stay away from whey products and this fits the bill, also has good flavor to just about any combination of fruits or vegetable I add. Plan on ordering more as soon I can.
customer_reviews.author: K. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay attention to the other reviews about taste. ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't pay attention to the other reviews about taste. People who aren't used to chalky protein powder ought to stick with sugary-sweet Body Fortress brand that they sell at Walmart (and which will cause you to break out with pimples).
customer_reviews.author: P.Lash

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor Ike any protein powder slight chalky taste at the end
customer_reviews.author: Fix it

customer_reviews.title: Great protein for vegetarians
customer_reviews.text: If you're a non-meat eater and looking for a protein, I recommend this product. I love it. It gives me my daily protein in a vegetarian form. I like the taste, although my daughter says it taste powdery, maybe my taste buds have adapted to the taste, but I enjoy it. I buy the vanilla toffee, and use almond milk and add frozen fruit which adds more flavor and substance. The chocolate is pretty good as well, but I don't care for the plain.
customer_reviews.author: Adrean Hill-Horton

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this product the last two times I have ordered it. Both the Chocolate and the Toffee Vanilla have less flavor and a bitter after taste. This is not the same product I have been purchasing for about four years now. I will be looking for an alternative...
customer_reviews.author: Gail Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor even when mixed with only water. I have mixed it into plain oatmeal to give it added flavor, sweetness, and protein. It mixes well, no clumping, smooth and consistent texture. I highly recommend this delicious plant-based product!
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Liked that it had simple
customer_reviews.text: Liked that it had simple, all natural ingredients and I like the flavor but hated the taste. It was SO salty. One serving has as much sodium as a can of soup! I have no idea why they feel they need to add SALT to the recipe. :( So if that doesn't bother you, everything else about it was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Alan A

customer_reviews.title: Chalky. Gritty. Weird after taste. I've blended ...
customer_reviews.text: Chalky. Gritty. Weird after taste. I've blended it with water in a shaker bottle, with water in a ninja blender, with almond milk in the ninja. Nothing helps the texture. I will try baking with it, next.
customer_reviews.author: MamaFlynn

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tastes creamy and delicious
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor and it blends seamlessly with almond milk!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I switched from unflavored.
customer_reviews.text: Was making an awesome pb, carob, berry smoothie, with the unflavored. With this flavor, it masks what I'm adding. May be ok with just the powder and almond milk, but I doubt it. Strong, sweet, and fake flavor- 😁
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Not happy  with taste
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about the flavor. I understand its not going to taste like a milkshake. I tried to doctor it up to taste better, nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: knight

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't stomach the taste. Ended up ordering the Naked Pea. Still not a great taste but a half of a banana, some cinnamon and a little stevia goes a long way to make the taste more palatable.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: so for me it's too sweet if I do a full scoop
customer_reviews.text: Still trying it out, but not too shabby. The scoop is huge, much bigger than my other protein powders, so for me it's too sweet if I do a full scoop. The flavor is nice, but can be a little overwhelming if you're not a huge sweets fan.
customer_reviews.author: Brianamal

customer_reviews.title: This is a great protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great protein powder. It never leaves me bloated and is very easy on the stomach. Not a huge fan of this flavor, the Dutch chocolate is WAY batter. It taste good mixed in with things but alone it taste kinda artificial. Other than the flavor, this is a great plant based protein.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Good for Smoothies, Nasty by Itself
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product many times because it goes well in my smoothie recipe but when you try drinking it by itself, it makes you want to gag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This has been good protein. It's a bit grainy, but overall it helps greatly with recovery from my workouts, and is a good breakfast substitute when I need it in the mornings. The taste ain't great, but for healthy living it's a good trade off. I take mine with vanilla almond milk and that really brings out the vanilla toffee flavor. Will definitely be a steady user going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant to taste
customer_reviews.text: Unpalatable. The product does not easily disperse in water. It is needed a mixer to prepare a protein shake.
customer_reviews.author: VP1986

customer_reviews.title: If you love vanilla and Toffee than you'll love this
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get an upset stomach, or cramps after drinking this. I've always had a bit of sensitivity to protein shakes but this seems to work fine for me. I should advice however, the scoops are pretty f'ing massive.
customer_reviews.author: Ofir Dahan

customer_reviews.title: Ick
customer_reviews.text: I'm more of a chocolate girl, but wanted to get the vanilla in case my fiancée wanted some. It tastes like liquid oatmeal! Kind of gross! Not a big fan. It's also very gritty!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Altman

customer_reviews.title: Boost your protein
customer_reviews.text: I add this stuff to many foods (veggies, baking, sauces). It blends in well. Great in smoothies. Very neutral tasting.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Hardey

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Hemp protein tastes awful and is sticky. This tastes awful and dissolves well. Not as filling or as much fibre. When this is done I'm going back to organic hemp protein.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed with the the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Blah flavor and protein settles to the bottom of the bottle after blending and shaking
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Good but grainy
customer_reviews.text: I really like these but in the end I switched back to whey protein because the texture is off-putting
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. No problems with the taste and I like how it thickens up my shakes. I add also add chia and flax seeds, a banana, and a handful of frozen spinach. I'm satisfied until lunch time!
customer_reviews.author: FMRace

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I throughly it was pretty gross... it has a very distinct after taste, even if u mix it with fruit and milk.
customer_reviews.author: Rubi s.

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste & Great Source of Protein
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for post-exercise nutrition as well as a meal replacement several times a week. Good flavor, excellent in a smoothie and a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Cycle Chick

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. It is nice to change protein shake brands (also love Garden of Life Raw Protein-Vanilla Spiced Chai) every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful flavor, great product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful flavor, great product! I use this in the morning to start my day, keeps me full for a few hours. Great source of protein plus amino acids.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Tiriolo

customer_reviews.title: Grossssssssss.
customer_reviews.text: I use unflavored all the time, but this vanilla toffee is disgusting. Like... Inedible.
customer_reviews.author: Momobile

customer_reviews.title: and this one is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I train fairly intensely and trust the Now products. I wanted to add a vegetarian protein to my regimen, and this one is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Darsha

customer_reviews.title: This tastes way better that I expected
customer_reviews.text: This tastes way better that I expected. I mix with coconut milk. It can get chalky if you don't add liquid first or don't use a blender bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Whey Alternative
customer_reviews.text: Best flavored pea protein. Mixes well in my oatmeal and smoothies
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Wood

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt taste that great. Its cheap so I tried it
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt taste that great. Its cheap so I tried it. But the scoop is like 40 grams per serving. That is too big, it doesnt mix well and it takes too much protein to get the amount I need.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the product is ok but after 2 jars I still have my craving for sweets
customer_reviews.author: charlie stephens

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla Toffee flavor very strong, not subtle at all- ...
customer_reviews.text: Vanilla Toffee flavor very strong, not subtle at all- I then purchased the Natural Unflavored to mix 1/3 Toffee with 2/3 Unflavored to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: i really like this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: i really like this protein powder. flavor is not as good as whey protein flavor tends to be, but i don't mind it. flavor is quite strong- i can always taste it when i mix it in smoothies with other things. consistency is a bit dusty, so make sure to mix it well. i've used other protein powders that made my stomach hurt quite a bit- and my stomach isn't particularly weak- but i didn't have that problem at all with this powder. leaves me feeling full for a long time and will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ala.bel

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the flavor itself
customer_reviews.text: ...Not happy with the flavor itself. I believe plain vanilla would work better for me.
customer_reviews.author: turnup

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work for me - I didn't enjoy the flavor of this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Deshia32

customer_reviews.title: Taste great, mixes well
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. Arrived timely. Use it in our morning nutribullet shakes. Mixes well.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G. Edmonson

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the vegan lifter
customer_reviews.text: I have used NOW Sports products for some time, and am happy with this addition to my diet. It's flavor is good, a little bit of aftertaste but nothing too strong. I knock it down one star because you must be very careful when scooping and dumping this product into a mixer, it is super fine and tends to go everywhere with the smallest bump. I would suggest the company use a smaller scoop so you can more easily handle the product. Otherwise as far as the powder itself is concerned, it mixes really well and has been a good add for someone who needed more protein.
customer_reviews.author: Vandalay Industries

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I will order this product again ISO like this one thanks .
customer_reviews.author: Donna  Barricklow

customer_reviews.title: Something different
customer_reviews.text: I cannot purchase this flavor where I live, so was glad I got to try it .
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Taste so good, love it build muscle without Whey rules.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Fairly priced
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting plant based powder that I’ve tried so far would buy again which I plan to do right now
customer_reviews.author: mark mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly and good flavor  but there are better out there.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as SAN RawFusion and contains xylitol which can be dangerous to your pets if spilled but overall still a good low carb protein mix. Budget friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Danley

customer_reviews.title: tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Now Foods Pea Protein Supplement, Vanilla Toffee. Tastes great, great price and plant based. I would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Redcay

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was just okay. Kind of grainy, but it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: MMarty

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its too fine a powder and doesn't mix well either
customer_reviews.author: NYerr

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but doesn't keep me full
customer_reviews.text: I would give this protein 5 stars for flavor. It is delicious. However, when used in smoothies I feel hungry after about 90 minutes. Other proteins keeps me fill for several hours. I did try adding a spoonful of nut butter and that helped.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L

customer_reviews.title: Taste is ok a but it is a bit pasty ...
customer_reviews.text: Taste is ok a but it is a bit pasty. Also doesn't mix well and settles in liquids if you don't drink it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: gotmybagspacked

customer_reviews.title: Stick with chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Cannot tolerate this taste, too chalky. My preference is chocolate and I should have stuck with that, but I wanted to try something different, looking for something more versatile than chocolate, but vanilla would probably be a better choice....not sure though. I haven't tried this powder in vanilla, but the chocolate was good, much better tasting than this vanilla toffee.
customer_reviews.author: F. Sarre

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It's a personal preference thing but I did not love the taste of this.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Harvey

customer_reviews.title: I think this is one of the best.
customer_reviews.text: I am 75 years old and have used protein powders at least 50 years . I think this is one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Love chalk? This is the protein for you!!
customer_reviews.text: The only plus of this stuff is that it's not ridiculously sweet, like some proteins [hence 2 stars instead one 1]. The downside? It won't mix! At all! It was like drinking chalky flour water. I was coughing and choking on it every time. Didn't matter how much water I used, or how vigorously I blended it (I tried a blender, a stick blender, and regular blender bottle - no dice). I love myself too much to choke this stuff down, so I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: The Vanilla Toffee tastes very good to me
customer_reviews.text: I've been using NOW Sports pea protein for over a year. The Vanilla Toffee tastes very good to me, but I just ordered the Dutch Chocolate and look forward to trying that. I use it for pre-workout calories by blending with four tablespoons of raw oats and some frozen blueberries or strawberries, and for post-workout recovery I usually don't add anything besides unsweetened organic cashew milk. Some people complain about the 'grainy texture', but I don't notice it much and it's never bothered me. The high degree of purity and nutritional value of this powder is what's most important to me. Discovering it tastes so good was a pleasant surprise, but certainly not a requirement. Great job NOW Sports!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: I thoroughly enjoy that.
customer_reviews.text: Wife thoroughly enjoys taking this product with her morning smoothies. Other powders have left her bloated and gasy. This Pea Protein does NOT. I thoroughly enjoy that.
customer_reviews.author: Troy H.

customer_reviews.title: This flavor is the best I have had of any brand
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is the best I have had of any brand. I mix it with blue berries, raspberries, and black berries some coconut milk, almond butter, cinnamon and fresh ground flaxseed. It taste like butterscotch
customer_reviews.author: Blank

customer_reviews.title: Decent flavor but unfortunately comes with a grainy, gritty consistency.
customer_reviews.text: The Vanilla Toffee flavor is actually pretty tasty. The consistency is very grainy however and does not mix well at all. Reminds me of a lot of the creatine powders. I suppose I have been spoiled by the great flavor and mixing of the Growing Naturals Vanilla Blast pea protein. I was hoping to find another alternative to throw in the rotation but this one just does not make the grade.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the vanilla toffee as much as the Dutch chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the vanilla toffee as much as the Dutch chocolate. The vanilla toffee doesn't have as much flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain shopper

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worst protein I've ever tried. It's very chalky and doesn't taste good :( I don't recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: I'm a health nut so I know things that may taste just ok are good for you. I eat kale for goodness sake. But this is nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Grinnell

product_meta.title: NOW Sports Nutrition, Pea Protein 25 G With BCAAs, Easily Digested, Vanilla Toffee Powder, 2-Pound
product_meta.description: Size:2 Pound (Pack of 1)Peas are well known for being a source of highly bioavailable protein. Additionally, peas are not considered one of the major dietary allergens. Collectively, this makes pea protein an ideal source of post-workout nutrition for athletes who may have difficulty supplementing with other types of protein. NOW Sports Pea Protein is a non-GMO vegetable protein isolate that has 25 grams of easily-digested protein. Each 1 scoop serving typically has over 4,400 mg of branched chain amino acids (BCAAs), and over 2,000 mg of arginine. NOW Sports Pea Protein has a smooth texture and mixes easily into your favorite beverages.
feature_bullets: Same trusted quality with a brand new look! Packaging may vary
25 G PROTEIN PER SERVING: A non-GMO vegetable protein isolate that has 25 grams of easily-digested protein
WITH BCAAs: Each 1 scoop serving typically has over 4,400 mg of branched chain amino acids (BCAAs) and over 2,000 mg of arginine

GMP Quality Assured: NPA A-rated GMP certification means that every aspect of the NOW manufacturing process has been examined, including our laboratory/testing methods (for stability, potency, and product formulation)
Packaged in the USA by a family owned and operated company since 1968
